verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump ’s trade adviser] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [V: blamed] [ARG1: Canada] [ARG2: for the failure to finalize a reboot of the North American Free Trade Agreement] and suggested the country ’s prime minister is headed to hell for crossing the U.S. leader .
